response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and we believe it would be equally beneficial to you. Given its significance, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we are confident that the value it brings will far exceed the cost. Please let us know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 950000}
